transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Hi, I'd like to schedule an appointment please.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thanks for calling PivotPoint Orthopedics. Part of Pretty Good AI. Am I speaking with Alex?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Yes, this is Alex Chen.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Got it, Alex. Can you please provide your date of birth?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Sure, it's March 15, 1992.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Got it, Alex. How can I help you today?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: I'd like to schedule a routine annual checkup for next week, if possible.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thanks, Alex. At Diddeh Point Orthopedics, we offer new patient consultations, follow-up consultations, procedure appointments,

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: I'm looking for a new patient consultation for a routine checkup.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: and physical therapy sessions. Don't have a specific annual checkup, but a new patient consultation or follow-up consultation may fit your needs. Do you know which type you like, or would you like a quick overview of these options?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: A new patient consultation sounds like what I need. Let's go with that.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Perfect. We have new patient consultations available with several providers next week. Do you have a preferred provider or time of day for your appointment?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: I don't have a preferred provider, but I'm free any day next week except Wednesday. Morning appointments would be great if possible.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Got it. Let me check for new patient console openings next week in the morning. Excluding Wednesday. One moment while I fetch the available times.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Sure, thank you.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: There aren't any morning new patient consultation openings next week

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: In that case, do you have any afternoon slots available next week, except Wednesday?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Would you like me to check for morning opening?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Yes, please check for any afternoon openings next week, except Wednesday.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Don and Alex. Let me check for new patient consultation openings in the afternoon next week. Excluding Wednesday. One moment while I look that up.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Thank you. I'll wait.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: There aren't any afternoon new patient consultation

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: I understand. Could you please check for any available slots the following week?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Would you like me to check for openings the fall?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Yes, please check for any available openings the following week. Thank you.
